Resources.Region - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.project
Represents a region on the competition map grid, delimited by its lower-left and upper-right corners (inclusive).

rgbThreshold2 - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.LightLocalizer

ROTATE_SPEED - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Resources
The speed at which the robot rotates in degrees per second.
run() - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.LightLocalizer
Continuously get the red value of both color sensors to continously update the value of redValue1 and redValue2 until an interrupt is detected
run() - Method in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Navigation
